name: Hotel Joyce - Astotel

reviews.text: I'm just back from a few days in Paris, where I stayed at Hotel Joyce.
reviews.title: Small room, but otherwise perfect

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The positives: very friendly, helpful staff; the hotel is very clean and well decorated; the breakfast buffet was perfect; free wi-fi; good location
reviews.title: Simply outstanding!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The only negative: the room was small. Not tiny, but certainly not big.
reviews.title: Wonderful!

reviews.text: Having said that, I'd definitely stay at Hotel Joyce the next time I'm in Paris.
reviews.title: Nice comfortable Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at hotel Joyce for 2 nights at the start of February to celebrate my birthday. The hotel exceeded all our expectations, particularly as it is only a 3 star! Service was excellent and all staff we're only too happy to help. The room was spotless and really comfortable. We loved the quirky design of the hotel and it is in a great location close to the metro. I would definitely recommend anyone to stay here and we are already looking at going back in the summer!
reviews.title: Nice little hotel but breakfast service was not attentive and terrible

reviews.text: Love, love, love this hotel
reviews.title: Contempoary bliss in a tradional city.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Right in the centre of it all, but so quiet and serene.love the modern feel of the place and the rooms are lovely - epecially the big bathroom.
reviews.title: beautiful journey

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The breakfast/ cafe room was my favourite place to be... Atrium and all.
reviews.title: just perfect!
Free "bar" is a great thing
reviews.text: Staff are very friendly and will go out of their way to help with directions ect. Will definetly be back!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed with my husband at this hotel for 6 nights.
reviews.title: Exellent

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: For the price ...fantastic place a great find.. Friendly staff... Clean modern design.. Good continental breakfast .. No alcohol ...but free soft drinks!
reviews.title: Great budget find

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We chose this hotel because of the great reviews and somewhat lower price. It was definitely a great decision. The rooms are small, but clean and cute. Despite the small beds, its perfect! The location is very convenient, walkable to downtown if you dont mind longer walks, and 5 minutes to the metro! Theres also a bus line that drives right by and goes to major sites.The breakfast is good and all of the employees were extremely helpful with anything we needed - made dinner reservations, let us check in early, and got us a shuttle to the airport. Great place and would definitely stay there again!
reviews.title: Great hotel and and service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: In my opinion this hotel hits many marks: good location (the area is really cool and the closeby metro station is conveniently positioned on a line that cut the city centre from North to South and is only 2 stations away from Gare du Nord), rather quiet street (the noise is kept away by the windows too), a good bed, nice interior design, a decent breakfast and extremely polite and helpful staff. Plus some bonuses: free Wifi, free water and drinks at the bar. We will surely use it again.
reviews.title: Hidden gem in a very nice neighbourhood.

reviews.text: I stayed at this hotel for my business trip. I booked the suite room at the 6th floor. The room was big and very comfortable, the bed are a bit small, when you are visiting with 2 people. What I missed were Dutch tv channels, there were al kind of channels to choose but notting from Holland. Breakfast was good and incl. the price. The staff was very friendly and helpfull.
reviews.title: Business trip

reviews.text: The location is good, in the heart of Montmartre. The design of the hotel, both rooms and communal spaces is gorgeous, I love it. The rooms are quite, with pleasant atmosphere. The breakfast includes everything: 3 types of croissants, cereals, fresh fruits, vegetables, colds cuts, a couple types of cheese. I strongly recommend. Free wi-fi and friendly stuff as a bonus. Enjoy.
reviews.title: All that you might need from a Parisian hotel

reviews.text: Stayed at this hotel for a weekend break. About 20 mins walk from Gard du Nord. Less than 5 mins from Saint George and Pigalle metro stations so very well connected and only 10 mins walk from Montmatre.
reviews.title: Very friendly, great value!

reviews.text: Free wifi, friendly check-in staff, great breakfast included in price. Has a boutique feel. Rooms are great. Beds are a bit small.
reviews.title: Our french holidays in January

reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised when I've stayed with my daughter at the hotel Joyce. The room was small, but very comfortable and always clean and with good sound insulation. Breakfasts were delicious with fine French pastries. Pleasant impression left the hotel staff, especially receptionist Samuel. Thank you for our French holidays in January.
reviews.title: You must become a repeater!

reviews.text: >> Decoration
reviews.title: Wow!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The design of this hotel is beautiful. This is like "FRANCE"!
reviews.title: Very nice, for Paris

description: In the heart of Paris 9, the new Joyce Hotel opened in November 2009. A harmony of comfort, elegance and exceptional brightness, a pure example of Parisian hospitality. Each room is unique, the lounge under the glass roof drawers you to linger.
